modName: Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - brighter color
summary: i just modified the skin tone brightness to be more white  and less red from, the mod of the same name
descriptionHtml:
First i will say that i have not made those texture its texture from
<br />Real Girls Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNBase - WIP by [b]Zonzai and Seren4XX[/b]
<br />i want to thanks them, for making this awsome texture that look so real
<br />the link for the original texture is here go endorse them, if you like the modification i made
<br />http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425/?
<br />
<br />   Like i said i love this texture and use it for a long time now,but for some reason with my enb (realvision modified ) ,the texture looked to redish to my taste in many lightning situation see pictures the first one is before the second is after with exacly same lighning.
<br />
<br />i only opened the texture in photoshop and put a bit more brightness and lowered just a bit color saturation.
<br />
<br />
<br />Choose between the original 4k,or the medium resolution depending of your pc
          the uncom,pressed 4k take 100mb vram the medium res still 4k but its compressed so it take only 17 mb vram
           For low end pc there is the small res version that is 2k and require only 4 mb vram
<br /> 
            I added a more brighter tone skin ,not very much brighter but a bit its caller real girl even brighter.for the mom,ent only the large version 4k is available for this tone.i will upload the  low resolution soon.

so now you have the choice bwetween 2 skins tones.brighter or even brighter witch is a bit more bright. Let me know in the comment if you would like to have other skin tone.
<br />

INSTALLATION
<br />
<br />copy paste the data folder in your skyrim folder and replace the texture


If you want to see the texture in a video and not in a screenshots,see this link here or go in the video section.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gObwYBAgriA
author: soulraver

files.name: real girl  brighter color Mediumeven brighter
